description:

description:
Slimbook Fedora 2 laptops launch today as the first portable computers to ship with the latest Fedora Linux 40 operating system pre-installed.

The post Slimbook Fedora 2 Laptops Launch with Fedora Linux 40 Workstation appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Slimbook Fedora 2 Laptops Launch with Fedora Linux 40 Workstation

description:
Fedora Linux 40 distribution has been officially released and it's now available for download powered by the latest Linux 6.8 kernel series and featuring the GNOME 46 and KDE Plasma 6 desktop environments.

The post Fedora Linux 40 Officially Released with Linux Kernel 6.8, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fedora Linux 40 Officially Released with Linux Kernel 6.8, Here’s What’s New

description:
Tails 6.2 security-focused distribution is now available for download with improved mitigations of the Spectre v4 processor vulnerability, as well as the latest Tor technologies for enhanced anonymity.

The post Tails 6.2 Anonymous Linux OS Improves Mitigation of Spectre v4 Vulnerability appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Tails 6.2 Anonymous Linux OS Improves Mitigation of Spectre v4 Vulnerability
